titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3005) to extend trade authorities procedures with respect to reciprocal trade agreements.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-323, by Mr. Reynolds.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3005 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Provides that the amendment recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means now printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in the House Report 107-323 shall be considered as adopted. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 105.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 306.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 202 (Roll no. 479).

bill.summary: 12/5/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3005 (fast track trade authority).
